review_blob: Cask at Grantham Beer Festival 2009, this was a very fruity, lots of hops, light pale with a bitter after taste very refreshing beer on a hot day
A splendid quaff-able Porter that leaves you wanting a lot more. The vanilla and chocolate are well balanced in this beer.
Great fruity aroma, good pale yellow and great head, great flavour for such low gravity, grapefruit overtones, an extremely refreshing and flavourful pint.
